article_text: “Japan Declares War on U.S., England.” The Journal’s front page the day after Pearl Harbor broke the mold for the paper, but the forward-looking analysis would be a staple. Today in WSJ History, published Dec. 8, 1941. (Readers: To zoom in on the type, hit the Fullscreen arrows in the window around the newspaper page, and click on Original Document PDF at the upper-right.)

article_summary:
Today in WSJ History, published Dec. 8, 1941.
“Japan Declares War on U.S., England.” The Journal’s front page the day after Pearl Harbor broke the mold for the paper, but the forward-looking analysis would be a staple.
